snippet: Trying to expand his advantage at the Bridgestone Invitational, Day did well just to finish his round with a share of the lead. He and Scott Piercy were tied at five-under-par 205....
abstract: Jason Day and Scott Piercy share third round lead at Bridgestone Invitational golf tournament in Akron, Ohio.
lead_paragraph: Trying to expand his advantage at the Bridgestone Invitational, Day did well just to finish his round with a share of the lead. He and Scott Piercy were tied at five-under-par 205.

headline.main: Jason Day’s Inconsistent Tee Shots Hinder His Bid at Firestone
headline.print_headline: Inconsistent Off Tees, Day Just Keeps Share of Lead
